page.title: 07ENERGY
page.content: (ELECTRICAL)The area is well served by Norweb;the local headquarters is at Preston.The area is criss-crossed with electric wires supported by pylons,with some underground supply also. Electricity been here since 1932. (GAS)Gas has only been in the area for about 12 years.Parts of Freckleton,Lea Town,Clifton,Salwick are not yet supplied,but gas is availabe to most of the Newton houses except the far flung ones.A large gas main taking gas from Morecambe Bay to Liverpool cuts through the area;this was installed in 1984 (NUCLEAR)There is a certain amount of nuclear fuel processed from uranium ores at B.N.F.L. Salwick.This factory employs many people from both inside and outside the area.
